name: Swarm Rush
description:
Defend your base from an encroaching infestation in this satisfying tower defense game! Use powerful weapons to fend off the advancing waves of bugs. Find the strategy that works for you and utilize multiple tower types to create an impenetrable defense network.

This is the first game I've ever made. I set aside 2 weeks to try and make something I could be proud of, and here is the result! All animations, pixel art and programming is my work. Please give me any feedback you can. 

If you decide to play the game, tell me how long you played it for! My goal was to keep a player engaged for at least 5 minutes, and leave them with something they can remember fondly, and launch every now and again to kill some time. 

Thanks for your time!
